alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 05 at 1:10PM MST until July 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Red Flag Warnings Issued For Thursday and Friday This Week... Increasing windy conditions Thursday will persist into Friday. This wind, combined with single digits RHs in the afternoons will promote rapid fire spread. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST FOR BOTH THURSDAY AND FRIDAY DUE TO STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR MUCH OF NORTHERN ARIZONA... The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a Red Flag Warning due to strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 8 PM MST Thursday. A Red Flag Warning has also been issued from 11 AM to 8 PM MST Friday. * AFFECTED AREA...Locations near Eagar-Springerville and Saint Johns. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring or are imminent. A combination of strong winds and low relative humidities can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please notify field crews of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
